id.description: Unique identifier for the email template.

name.description: Name or title of the email template.

description.description: Brief description of the email template and its purpose.

default.description: Flag indicating if the template is the default one to use.

updated_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the email template was last updated.

created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the email template was created.

type.description: Type or category of the email template (e.g., welcome email, newsletter).

from.description: Email address or name of the sender for the email template.

cc.description: List of email addresses to be CC'd when using the template.

items.description: Email address in the CC list.

body.description: The main content body of the email template.

html_body.description: HTML formatted content of the email template.

user.description: User associated with the email template (creator or owner).
